headline: Is Huntington Ingalls Industries (HII) Among the Best Mid Cap Defense Stocks to Buy According to Analysts?
summary: We recently published a list of the 10 Best Mid Cap Defense Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. In this article, we will take a look at where Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc. (NYSE:HII) stands against other best mid cap defense stocks. Defense stocks have surged over the past week after President Trump unveiled plans for […]
